document.full_text: police are investigating a bus driver's hit-and-run claim after a horrific bus crash that killed 14 passengers and injured 18 others, officials said on sunday.
document.title: police, ntsb probe hit-and-run claim in ny bus crash
lines_and_colors: police are investigating a bus driver's hit-and-run claim after a horrific bus crash that killed 14 passengers and injured 18 others, officials said on sunday.
